name: Premium Over-Ear Headphones
description: High-quality over-ear headphones with advanced noise-canceling technology, Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, and Hi-Res Audio support.

name: Wireless In-Ear Headphones
description: Comfortable in-ear headphones with wireless functionality, sweat-resistant design, and intuitive touch controls.

name: Noise-Canceling On-Ear Headphones
description: On-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, foldable design, and a long-lasting battery for uninterrupted listening.

name: Gaming Headset with Mic
description: Gaming headset with immersive surround sound, detachable microphone, and customizable RGB lighting for a gaming experience like no other.

name: Wireless Sports Earbuds
description: Sports earbuds with waterproof design, noise isolation technology, and touch controls for hassle-free workouts.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Smart fitness watch with accurate heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking, and water-resistant features to accompany you on your fitness journey.

name: Stylish Smartwatch
description: Elegant smartwatch with vibrant AMOLED display, comprehensive fitness tracking, and real-time notifications for a connected lifestyle.

name: Hybrid Smartwatch
description: Hybrid smartwatch with classic analog watch design, advanced activity tracking, and detailed sleep analysis for a balanced lifestyle.

name: Rugged Outdoor Watch
description: Rugged outdoor watch with precise GPS navigation, shock-resistant construction, and barometer for outdoor enthusiasts and adventurers.

name: Fashionable Fitness Tracker
description: Fashionable fitness tracker with vibrant color display, accurate heart rate monitoring, and built-in pedometer to track your daily activities.

name: Running Shoes
description: High-performance running shoes with breathable mesh upper, shock-absorbent soles, and reflective detailing for enhanced visibility during night runs.

name: Trail Running Shoes
description: Trail running shoes with a durable outsole, toe protection, and advanced grip technology for stability and support on rugged terrains.

name: Athletic Sneakers
description: Athletic sneakers with a lightweight design, cushioned insole, and ventilation for maximum comfort and breathability during workouts.

name: Casual Slip-On Shoes
description: Casual slip-on shoes with easy slip-on style, memory foam insole, and flexible outsole for all-day comfort and convenience.

name: Formal Leather Shoes
description: Formal leather shoes with genuine leather construction, classic design, and anti-slip sole for a sophisticated and secure stride.
